Twain_DSM Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
APP_INFOStructure to hold data about a connected application, we use DS_LIST so we don't have to allocate memory that we don't need, on the theory that few applications will load more than one driver at a time
CTwnDsmThis is the main class for the Data Source Manager
CTwnDsm::_podWe use a pod system because it help prevents us from making dumb initialization mistakes
CTwnDsmAppsClass to hold list of connected applications
CTwnDsmAppsImplImpl Class to hold list of connected applications
CTwnDsmAppsImpl::_podWe use a pod system because it help prevents us from making dumb initialization mistakes
CTwnDsmLogOur logging class
CTwnDsmLogImplOur implementation class where we hide our attributes
CTwnDsmLogImpl::_podWe use a pod system because it help prevents us from making dumb initialization mistakes
DS_INFODescribes everything we need to know about the Data Source over the course of the session
DS_LISTStructure to hold a list of Data Sources
